summary: A test suite that validates the numerical implementation of the Hollweg1999 plasma dispersion solution, checking that parameter overrides work, array inputs are handled correctly, computed results match expected values, appropriate exceptions are raised for invalid ions, output structures are as specified, and relevant warnings are emitted.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the plasma dispersion calculation module, supporting reliable scientific analysis and preventing regressions in future development.
